name: DaLetterFarm-LD52
description:
Welcome to DaLetter Farm! Plant letter seeds, collect letter fruit to spell a word, submit, and gain scores! The character count limit is 15! Each letter plant grows during a different period. Letter plant also has different characteristics. Welcome to share your highest score or farm screenshot in the comment when you lose interest.

Credits:

Programmer: Lucas Qu

Designer: Wendy Hu
